articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Newly-Built Kumsanpho Fish Pickling Factory and Kumsanpho Fishery Station
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Newly-Built Kumsanpho Fish Pickling Factory and Kumsanpho Fishery Station
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the newly-built Kumsanpho Fish Pickling Factory and Kumsanpho Fishery Station.
					 The first leg of his visit was the Kumsanpho Fish Pickling Factory.
					
					 He went round the production building, pit-style storehouse, wharf, embankment, and Nunggum Islet-Chwi Islet breakwater to learn in detail about construction and preparations for production.
					
					 He said that the factory located in a good place from a maritime and ecological point of view and free from pollution looks spectacular when watching it from close range and far away. He added that another wonderful scenery appeared in the Kumsanpho area as it is in perfect harmony with the picturesque Nunggum Islet.
					
					 He gave an instruction which would serve as guidelines for managing and operating the factory.
					
					 The next leg of his visit was the Kumsanpho Fishery Station.
					
					 Going round various places of the fishery station such as the room for the education in the revolutionary history and fishermen's hostel, he learned in detail about its construction and preparations for its commissioning.
					
					 Looking round the wind and solar power station, he was pleased that the officials, scientists and technicians of the relevant field built the power station with a capacity of hundreds of kw which matches well the scenery around it, thus making it possible to satisfactorily meet the demands of the factory and the fishery station for electricity.
					
					 He gave the thanks of the Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army to all the soldier-builders engaged in the projects after highly praising them for successfully building the factory and the fishery station to which the Party attaches great importance as the icons in the era of the Workers' Party and thereby doing another good job for the people. 
					
					 He expressed the expectation and belief that the officials and employees of the relevant field, the factory and the fishery station would creditably perform their duty and thus make a positive contribution to improving the people's diet.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So, So Hong Chan, Kim Yong Su, Jo Yong Won and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Inspects Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Inspects Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex.
					 Going round various parts of the complex, he gave pep-talks to its workers making innovation in the efforts to increase the steel production.
					
					 A consultative meeting was called on the spot. It stressed the need for the metal industrial sector to take the lead in a drive for hitting the targets of the economic strategy, actively accept the advanced technology to reduce the iron production cost and put the operation of Juche-based production processes on a normal basis.
					
					 And measures were taken for relevant units to provide the complex with sufficient raw materials and fuel necessary for the production of iron and steel.
					
					 Earlier, the premier convened a consultative meeting of officials in the field of public health and relevant units at the Korea General Red Cross Hospital.
					
					 The meeting discussed measures for consolidating the material and technical foundations at hospitals, calling on all the officials to become devoted servants for the popular masses, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of giving priority to the people.

articles.title: Nothing Can Check DPRK from Developing Space: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Nothing Can Check DPRK from Developing Space: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in an article that nothing can check the DPRK from conquering outer space.
					 The article cites facts to prove that the U.S. has tried to ban the DPRK from launching a satellite by abusing the name of the UN while persistently denying the peaceful purpose of the satellite launch, recognized by the world community, and labeling it as "long-distance missile launch".
					
					 But, the U.S. and its vassal forces' heinous blackmail and sanctions could not deter the DPRK from exercising its legitimate right as a satellite manufacturing and launching state, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK's space development project is not a work that it can give up by others' opposition. It is a fixed resolution and will of the DPRK to push back the frontiers of science and technology in developing space with the dignity and self-respect of the nation.
					
					 It is its consistent stand and policy to provide the people with more civilized and abundant material and cultural life by turning space to good account and thus bring a bright future of the nation.
					
					 The DPRK will continue launching satellites for a peaceful purpose and emerge a space power to be envied by the world.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Hits S. Korean Authorities for Going against Nation's Desire for Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Hits S. Korean Authorities for Going against Nation's Desire for Reunification
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet regime laid bare its scheme to enforce traitor Park Geun Hye's confrontational policy, when drafting a "working plan" for various fields.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday terms the attempt a crime of going against the desire and will of the entire nation to open a broad avenue to independent reunification by its concerted efforts.
					
					 It is the unanimous demand of the nation that the south Korean authorities should accept the DPRK's patriotic appeal and sincere proposal for the national unity and reunification and come out for the improvement of the north-south relations and detente, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 However, the south Korean puppet regime has revealed its sinister scheme to steadily enforce Park Geun Hye's anti-national "policy toward the north" by making such reckless remarks as "keeping the basic content" and "sticking to the principle" while running amuck in the confrontational racket against the DPRK in collusion with foreign forces from the outset of the year.
					
					 This is a blatant challenge to the nation who has risen up to put an end to the confrontational era created by the group of traitors and open a new phase for the improved north-south relations and the independent reunification.
					
					 As such rascals, who are dead-set against the nation's aspiration for reunification and get hell-bent on the confrontation with fellow countrymen, stay in power in south Korea, the north-south relations are bogged down in catastrophe and the nuclear war crisis is escalating.
					
					 Clear is the conclusion drawn from this. In order to put an end to the confrontational era and open a new phase for the improvement of the north-south relations and independent reunification, it is urgent to wipe out the puppet conservative group running amuck to do harm to the fellow countrymen with the backing of foreign forces.

articles.title: All-out People's Action Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
All-out People's Action Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters for People's All-out Action in south Korea, composed of the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Federation of Peasants Associations and other organizations of different social strata, held a press conference in Seoul on January 10 and expressed the will to wage a more active struggle, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 Speakers said at the conference that nothing has changed except the decision of the "National Assembly" on the impeachment of Park Geun Hye though ten million of people staged candlelight struggle.
					
					 A press release was read out there. It said that they would form ranks to cope with the present reality and opt for the all-out action urging the immediate resignation of Park Geun Hye and the "constitutional court's" earlier decision on the motion calling for impeachment of Park.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Calls for Strong Candlelight Action
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Calls for Strong Candlelight Action
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The People's Emergency Action to Demand Resignation of Park Geun Hye Regime in south Korea reportedly called a press conference in Seoul on Jan. 11, in which it declared would struggle for an end to the Park regime.
					 Speakers at the conference maintained that just is the decision on earlier impeachment of Park made by the "constitutional court".
					
					 The political camp is keen on gearing up for "presidential" election in disregard of the demand of the candlelight holders after the passage of the motion calling for impeachment of Park, they noted, adding that counterattack of the Park forces is getting stronger with each passing hour.
					
					 A press release was read out.
					
					 In the release the organization vowed to fight it out until the accomplices of Park are completely punished and deep-rooted evil is abolished.
					
					 It declared Jan. 21 a day of intensive candlelight action for the implementation of earlier impeachment of Park in January.

articles.title: Officials of Chongryon Vow to Carry through Tasks Set forth by Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Officials of Chongryon Vow to Carry through Tasks Set forth by Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) met at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Jan. 11 to vow to carry out the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address and congratulatory message to Chongryon.
					 Among those present at the meeting were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairpersons of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee.
					
					 Read out there was a New Year congratulatory message Kim Jong Un sent to the chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee.
					
					 Making a report at the meeting, Ho Jong Man said that Kim Jong Un's New Year Address serves as a militant banner giving spurs to the all-people general onward movement for the victorious advance of socialism and as a thunder signaling fresh miracles and great events to be made this year.
					
					 The reporter noted that Kim Jong Un clearly showed the road ahead of Chongryon in his New Year congratulatory message to it.
					
					 He called upon all the members of Chongryon to turn out as one in the struggle for this year with a resolution to present a report of loyalty and delight to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting expressed their resolves to thoroughly apply Kim Jong Un's noble idea and intention in the patriotic work of Chongryon and carry into practice the plan indicated in his New Year message.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out there.

articles.title: Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Registered as Honorary Citizens in Ecuador
articles.content:
Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Registered as Honorary Citizens in Ecuador
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The city of San Miguel in Bolivar Province of Ecuador decided to register President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il, anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as its honorary citizens.
					 A decision on awarding the title of honorary citizenship to the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu was adopted on Jan. 8.
					
					 The decision said that the title of honorary citizenship is awarded to the peerlessly great persons of the DPRK in reflection of the boundless reverence of the San Miguel City government and its citizens for them and their will to strengthen the fraternal ties and solidarity with the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Reading sessions and seminars on the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, were held in Romania, Sweden, Finland, Slovenia and DR Congo between Jan. 3 and 5.
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos showing the feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Un. And there were works of the great persons and books and pictures introducing the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania said it is quite natural for the DPRK to bolster up its self-defensive deterrence through such test launch of intercontinental ballistic missile so as to cope with U.S. and its followers' persistent moves against it.
					
					 The chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea stressed that the DPRK people would surely win in their just struggle for prosperity of the country and national reunification and for the global peace and stability under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and other speakers said that Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address showed once again the iron will to frustrate the imperialists' anti-DPRK moves with powerful nuclear deterrence and defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the wellbeing of the people and the regional peace and security.
					
					 They stressed that the Korean people would perform a greater miracle in the struggle for the building of a powerful socialist country and national reunification in hearty response to his New Year Address.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Hailed Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Hailed Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Ethiopian and Nepalese organizations made public statements on Jan. 3 and 7 in support of the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said in its statement:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address stressed that the year 2016 was a year of revolutionary and auspicious event and great turn.
					
					 We keenly felt his outstanding leadership ability and iron pluck whenever the DPRK fully displayed its dignity and might through eye-opening events such as the first H-bomb test and the test-fire of various offensive means conducted last year in which the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea was held.
					
					 With the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism illuminating the road ahead of the Korean people, they will more dynamically advance toward the rosy future under the great blueprint of building a powerful socialist country unfolded at the 7th WPK Congress.
					
					 The Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics said in its statement:
					
					 We fully support the proposal for Korea's reunification set forth in the New Year address.
					
					 The imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK have reached an extreme, but they can never check the revolutionary advance of Juche Korea.
					
					 The DPRK will surely emerge victorious thanks to Kim Jong Un and the army and people single-mindedly united around him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre la fabrica de elaboracion de escabeche y empresa pesquera, de Kumsanpho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre la fabrica de elaboracion de escabeche y empresa pesquera, de Kumsanpho
Pyongyang, 15 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Elaboracion de Escabeche de Kumsanpho y la Empresa Pesquera de Kumsanpho.
					Primero, el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un estuvo en la Fabrica de Elaboracion de Escabeche de Kumsanpho.
					
					Recorriendo el edificio de produccion de la fabrica, el almacen en forma de galeria, el muelle y la costa, el malecon entre las islas Nunggum y Chui, se entero concretamente del estado de la construccion y los preparativos de produccion.
					
					Tanto desde lejos, como de cerca es muy vistoso el aspecto de la fabrica situada en el sitio magnifico libre de contaminacion de aire y limpio en lo oceanografico y ecologico, subrayo y agrego que es perfectamente armoniosa con la pintoresca isla Nunggum y aparecio otro paisaje maravilloso en la zona de Kumsanpho.
					
					Dio las instrucciones que sirven de guia en la administracion y gestion de la fabrica.
					
					Acto seguido, el Maximo Dirigente dirigio la Empresa Pesquera de Kumsanpho.
					
					Estando en la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria, el albergue de los pesqueros y otros lugares de la empresa, hizo detallado conocimiento de la marcha de la construccion y los preparativos de su inauguracion.
					
					Ese dia paso revista por la planta de energia natural donde mostro alegria diciendo que los funcionarios, cientificos y tecnicos de la rama interesada construyeron una central electrica con capacidad de cientos de kilovatios apropiada al paisaje de su contorno, satisfaciendo asi la demanda de electricidad necesaria a las dos unidades arriba mencionadas.
					
					El Ejercito Popular levanto excelentemente las dos unidades como obras arquitectonicas representativas de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo, dijo y evaluo los esfuerzos de los constructores uniformados movilizados en la construccion, quienes hicieron otro trabajo util para el pueblo, asi como les dio el agradecimiento del Comandante Supremo del EPC.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados de la rama interesa y de las dos unidades cumpliran satisfactoriamente con sus deberes asumidos, de manera que contribuiran al mejoramiento de la vida alimentaria del pueblo.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, So Hong Chan, Kim Yong Su, Jo Yong Won y Ma Won Chun.
